CmdLine: apk update && apk add --no-cache bash nginx php7-fpm php7-cli php7-common php7-json php7-soap php7-simplexml php7-session     && apk add --no-cache --virtual build-dependencies wget unzip     && wget --no-check-certificate https://github.com/phpvirtualbox/phpvirtualbox/archive/develop.zip -O phpvirtualbox.zip     && unzip phpvirtualbox.zip -d phpvirtualbox     && mkdir -p /var/www     && mv -v phpvirtualbox/*/* /var/www/     && rm phpvirtualbox.zip     && rm phpvirtualbox/ -R     && apk del build-dependencies     && echo "<?php return array(); ?>" > /var/www/config-servers.php     && echo "<?php return array(); ?>" > /var/www/config-override.php     && chown nobody:nobody -R /var/www
Commands.Name: run
